column4: hey everyone, does anyone know of a good and simple hex editor that allows you to modfy game values (essentially cheat) like artmoney, but for linux?
Oh how I wish I could mod this channel.
So I can help take care of people who belong in #ubuntu-offtopic.. and maybe not even there
i guess i'm just good at ignoring them
Guess you have to be if you're in here long enough :P
i've been around here qutie some time..lol
mneptok: How do you even end up being a mod?
thing is, i deal with idiots all day, real idiots, so when i come here and see wannabee morons, it doesn't bother me..lol
i think when theyw ant people to do it, they just kinda ask "regulars"
lol, hope he has a live cd
